title: I Was Kicked Out of the Party Because “I Can’t Keep Up With You”, and Also Was Kicked Out of the World Saying “There Is a World That Needs You”. I Will Move to the Earth and Become a Fake Psychic With Light Magic That I Am Good At - Novel Updates
tags: Cheats   Demon Lord   Depictions of Cruelty   Ghosts   Heroes   Magic   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist
author: Carl   カール
description:
After defeating the Demon Lord who had thrown the world into chaos, the Hero, Raid, found himself in a rough spot.

He was kicked out of the party he had always thought of as his friends (the ones he had been introduced to by the guild three days earlier), saying, “I can’t keep up with you.” Then, later that same night, he was forcibly transferred to Earth by a self-proclaimed god who said, “You’ve gone a bit overboard, so why don’t you to Earth for now?” And so the hero Raid was forcibly transferred to Earth.

On Earth, however, he gets addicted to manga and develops a severe case of chuunibyou, and becomes famous as a psychic, sometimes taking on evil spirits, sometimes monsters, and sometimes humans.

This is that kind of a story.>
